name: Toymaker
description:
This is a walking simulator, relax and enter the world of the Toy Maker.
Explore lost areas and hidden passages to discover the secrets of the unknown Japanese lost game: Toy Maker.
Every game session is very dynamic so unlocking levels and secrets might take lot of tries depending on luck.

Main game features

  • Use headphones for better immersion
  • Use arrow keys to walk, no WASD for a more retro feel
  • ALT+F4 to close
  • Ported to Windows 7+
  • Explore creepy surroundings
  • Discover secrets out of bounds
  • Jumpscares
  • Walking simulator
  • More levels will be added in future updates
